document_data.name: Xisar
document_data.deathnotes: Whether the kraken truly died or not is unknown.
document_data.mainbody: '''Xisar''', or simply the '''Blue Kraken''', was a powerful [[kraken]] of history in [[Serôs]].
document_data.History:
A very unusual sapphire-blue-tinged kraken, Xisar attacked [[Es'purr]] and the [[Hills of Eralis]] multiple times, trying to enslave the eastern [[locathah]] tribes.

In [[1297 DR]], Xisar began its last terror campaign. In [[1304 DR]], the [[storm giant]] hero [[Volar]] confronted the Blue Kraken at the [[Bymmal Trench]]. Neither hero nor villain were seen since.

By [[1370 DR]], most beings considered Xisar a creature of legend.
document_data.Activities: Usually it was awake for six years of every twenty-four.
